Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Java class that serves as a template for interacting with RocketMQ producers, providing various methods to send messages (including ordered messages) with configurable parameters.

Class Description: The RocketMQTemplate class is a utility class that simplifies interaction with RocketMQ producers. It manages producer instances, provides default configurations, and offers multiple methods for sending messages with different levels of customization. The class handles both regular and ordered message sending, with configurable timeouts, queue numbers, and producer groups.

Attributes:
- log: [InternalLogger] - Logger instance for error and debug logging
- DEFAULT_PRODUCER_GROUP: [String] - Default producer group name
- DEFAULT_QUEUE_NUM: [int] - Default number of queues
- DEFAULT_SEND_MSG_TIMEOUT: [int] - Default message sending timeout in milliseconds
- producerMap: [Map<String, DefaultMQProducer>] - Map storing producer instances with their configuration keys

Methods:
- getProducer() -> [DefaultMQProducer] - Gets a producer with default settings
- getProducer([int queueNum]) -> [DefaultMQProducer] - Gets a producer with custom queue number
- getProducer([String producerGroup, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [DefaultMQProducer] - Gets a producer with custom group and timeout
- getProducer([int queueNum, String producerGroup, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [DefaultMQProducer] - Gets a fully customized producer
- send([String topic, String body]) -> [SendResult] - Sends a message with default settings
- send([String topic, String body, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Sends a message with custom timeout
- send([String producerGroup, String topic, String body, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Sends a message with custom group and timeout
- send([String producerGroup, String topic, String tags, String body, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Sends a message with tags
- send([String producerGroup, String topic, String tags, String keys, String body, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Sends a message with tags and keys
- send([String producerGroup, Message message, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Internal method for sending messages
- sendOrderly([String producerGroup, String topic, String keys, String body]) -> [SendResult] - Sends ordered message with default timeout
- sendOrderly([String producerGroup, String topic, String keys, String body, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Sends ordered message with custom timeout
- sendOrderly([String producerGroup, String topic, String tags, String keys, String body, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Sends ordered message with tags
- sendOrderly([String producerGroup, Message message, int sendMsgTimeout]) -> [SendResult] - Internal method for sending ordered messages
